actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend section 103(f) of the Agricultural Act of 1949 (loan rates for upland cotton) and to provide for prevented planting disaster payments in crop year 1979 when other, non-conserving crops are planted.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to state that the loan level for the 1980 and 1981 crops of upland cotton shall not be less than the loan level established for the 1979 crop. Reduces from 33 1/3 percent to 15 percent of the established price the payment rate factor in the formulae for the calculation of prevented planting disaster payments for the 1979 crops only of cotton, feed grains, rice, and wheat.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 103(f) of the Agricultural Act of 1949 (loan rates for upland cotton) and to provide for prevented planting disaster payments in crop year 1979 when other, non-conserving crops are planted.
